title: "Data Appendix"
format: pdf
editor: visual

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

stardew_all <- read.csv("stardew_all.csv") |> select(!Timestamp) |> mutate(from = "All")
stardew_smith <- read.csv("stardew_smith.csv") |> select(!Timestamp) |> mutate(from = "Smith")

stardew_data <- rbind(stardew_all, stardew_smith)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = stardew_data, aes(x = gender, fill = from)) + geom_bar() + labs(title = "Gender Identity Distribution", x = "Gender", y = "Count")
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = stardew_data, aes(x = marriage_candidate, fill = hobbies)) + geom_bar() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) + labs(title = "Marriage Choice By Hobbies", x = "Marriage Choice", y = "Count")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = stardew_data, aes(x = marriage_candidate, fill = personality)) + geom_bar() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) + labs(title = "Marriage Choice By Personality", x = "Personality", y = "Count")
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = stardew_data, aes(x=age, color=gender)) +
  geom_density()
```
